This app is easy to use\nJust log in with your valid facebook username and password or create a new account if you don\'t have one already.Then click on the button with the next symbol on it in the botton right corner of the screen. It starts out empty, but you can click on the overflow menu to select from the menu. For instance you can insert a few movie titles, or go to the settings screen. When the movies are displayed in the listView in the main screen, you can click on the movie you want to go to a detail screen to see details about that movie including a few video highlights about that movie.
